review: Better than i expected.  I highly recommend one
author: Roc S "Roc S"

review: Worked as advertised, faster to load than the Xbox 360 for things like HuluPlus and Netflix.
author: Rhonda Ettinger

review: Great bang for the buck. Especially if you already have prime.
author: Christopher Stradtman

review: Keeps the kids happy and me too
author: Tim Deaton

review: The stick is very easy to set up out of the box.  The functionality has been flawless and there are several applications available.  This is a MUST have if you are a prime member!
author: Jeremy Rasch

review: Fantastic. Perfect for users who don't own an xbox or ps4. The plex app is really cool, and streaming is mostly a breeze. Once or twice the wifi network dropped, but it picked right back up again.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Like it a lot it has a lot of apps that my sister likes.
author: Violeta Flores
